name: Oddish
description: If exposed to moonlight, it starts to move. It roams far and wide at night to scatter its seeds.

attacks.name: Blot
attacks.effect: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Gloom
description: Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odor. The horrid stench can cause fainting at a distance of 1.25 miles.

name: Bellossom
description: Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances, its petals rub together and make a pleasant ringing sound.

name: Tangela
description: Hidden beneath a tangle of vines that grows nonstop even if the vines are torn off, this Pokémon's true appearance remains a mystery.

name: Tangrowth
description: Tangrowth has two arms that it can extend as it pleases. Recent research has shown that these arms are, in fact, bundles of vines.

attacks.name: Mega Drain
attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Yanma
description: Its eyes can see 360 degrees without moving its head. It won't miss prey—even those behind it.

attacks.name: Air Slash
attacks.effect: Discard a random Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Roselia
description: Its flowers give off a relaxing fragrance. The stronger its aroma, the healthier the Roselia is.

name: Roserade
description: After captivating opponents with its sweet scent, it lashes them with its thorny whips.

attacks.name: Poisonous Whip
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Turtwig
description: It uses its whole body to photosynthesize when exposed to sunlight. Its shell is made from hardened soil.

name: Grotle
description: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.

name: Torterra
description: Ancient people imagined that beneath the ground dwelt a gigantic Torterra.

attacks.name: Frenzy Plant
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use .

name: Kricketot
description: Its legs are short. Whenever it stumbles, its stiff antennae clack with a xylophone-like sound.

name: Kricketune
description: By allowing its cry to resonate in the hollow of its belly, it produces a captivating sound.

attacks.name: Entrancing Melody
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Burmy
description: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

name: Wormadam
description: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.

attacks.name: Leaf Cutter
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Combee
description: At night, Combee sleep in a group of about a hundred, packed closely together in a lump.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.effect: Put 1 random  from your deck onto your Bench.

name: Vespiquen
description: It houses its colony in cells in its body and releases various pheromones to make those grubs do its bidding.

name: Carnivine
description: It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.

attacks.name: Flog
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Leafeon
description: When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of sunshine, you'll know it is using photosynthesis to produce clean air.

attacks.name: Leafy Cyclone
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

name: Mow Rotom
description: The lawn mower is one of the household appliances that led to the development of the Rotom Dex.

attacks.name: Energy Cutoff
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Shaymin
description: It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.

abilities.name: Fragrant Flower Garden
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may heal 10 damage from each of your Pokémon.

name: Magmar
description: Magmar dispatches its prey with fire. But it regrets this habit once it realizes that it has burned its intended prey to a charred crisp.

attacks.name: Stoke
attacks.effect: Take a Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

name: Magmortar
description: When Magmortar inhales deeply, the fire burning in its belly intensifies, rising in temperature to over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.

attacks.name: Bursting Inferno
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

name: Slugma
description: A common sight in volcanic areas, it slowly slithers around in a constant search for warm places.

name: Magcargo
description: Its brittle shell occasionally spouts intense flames that circulate throughout its body.

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

name: Chimchar
description: Its fiery rear end is fueled by gas made in its belly. Even rain can't extinguish the fire.

name: Monferno
description: It skillfully controls the intensity of the fire on its tail to keep its foes at an ideal distance.

attacks.name: Flare Blitz
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Heat Rotom
description: If the convection microwave oven is not working properly, then the Rotom inhabiting it will become lethargic.

attacks.name: Heat Breath
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Swinub
description: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.

name: Piloswine
description: If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on its back stand up straight. It is very sensitive to sound.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks from or Pokémon.

name: Mamoswine
description: This Pokémon can be spotted in wall paintings from as far back as 10,000 years ago. For a while, it was thought to have gone extinct.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks from or Pokémon.

name: Regice
description: With cold air that can reach temperatures as low as −328 degrees Fahrenheit, Regice instantly freezes any creature that approaches it.

abilities.name: Crystal Body
abilities.effect: Prevent all effects of attacks used by your opponent's Pokémon done to this Pokémon.

name: Piplup
description: It doesn't like to be taken care of. It's difficult to bond with since it won't listen to its Trainer.

attacks.name: Nap
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Prinplup
description: It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, every one of them believes it is the most important.

name: Empoleon
description: It swims as fast as a jet boat. The edges of its wings are sharp and can slice apart drifting ice.

attacks.name: Aqua Jet
attacks.effect: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Buizel
description: It spins its two tails like a screw to propel itself through water. The tails also slice clinging seaweed.

name: Floatzel
description: With its flotation sac inflated, it can carry people on its back. It deflates the sac before it dives.

attacks.name: Jet Screw
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Shellos
description: It used to have a shell on its back long ago. This species is closely related to Pokémon like Shellder.

name: Gastrodon
description: They normally inhabit rocky seashores, but in times of continuous rain, they can sometimes be found in the mountains, far from the sea.

attacks.name: Muddy Water
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Finneon
description: The line running down its side can store sunlight. It shines vividly at night.

attacks.name: Elegant Swim
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

name: Lumineon
description: With its shining light, it lures its prey close. However, the light also happens to attract ferocious fish Pokémon—its natural predators.

name: Snover
description: During cold seasons, it migrates to the mountain's lower reaches. It returns to the snow-covered summit in the spring.

attacks.name: Ice Shard
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Abomasnow
description: It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards.

name: Glaceon
description: It can control its body temperature at will. This enables it to freeze the moisture in the atmosphere, creating flurries of diamond dust.

attacks.name: Ice Beam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Wash Rotom
description: This Rotom has entered a washing machine. It nods with satisfaction after it floods the surrounding area.

name: Frost Rotom
description: This Rotom has entered a refrigerator. It leaps around gleefully after it uses cold air to freeze the area around it.

attacks.name: Blizzard
attacks.effect: This attack also does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dimensional Storm
attacks.effect: Discard 3 Energy from this Pokémon. This attack also does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Manaphy
description: It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond with any kind of Pokémon.

attacks.name: Oceanic Gift
attacks.effect: Choose 2 of your Benched Pokémon. For each of those Pokémon, take a Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to that Pokémon.

name: Magnemite
description: The electromagnetic waves emitted by the units at the sides of its head expel antigravity, which allows it to float.

name: Magneton
description: Three Magnemite are linked by a strong magnetic force. Earaches will occur if you get too close.

name: Magnezone
description: As it zooms through the sky, this Pokémon seems to be receiving signals of unknown origin while transmitting signals of unknown purpose.

attacks.name: Thunder Blast
attacks.effect: Discard a Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Voltorb
description: It rolls to move. If the ground is uneven, a sudden jolt from hitting a bump can cause it to explode.

attacks.name: Big Explosion
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

name: Electrode
description: The more energy it charges up, the faster it gets. But this also makes it more likely to explode.

name: Electabuzz
description: Many power plants keep Ground-type Pokémon around as a defense against Electabuzz that come seeking electricity.

attacks.name: Charge
attacks.effect: Take a Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

name: Electivire
description: The amount of electrical energy this Pokémon produces is proportional to the rate of its pulse. The voltage jumps while Electivire is battling.

attacks.name: Exciting Voltage
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra Energy attached, this attack does 80 more damage.

name: Shinx
description: The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.

attacks.name: Hide
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

name: Luxio
description: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.

name: Luxray
description: It can see clearly through walls to track down its prey and seek its lost young.

attacks.name: Volt Bolt
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 120 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sparking Gadget
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Rotom
description: Its electricity-like body can enter some kinds of machines and take control in order to make mischief.

attacks.name: Assault Laser
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Togepi
description: The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said that it will share good luck when treated kindly.

name: Togetic
description: They say that it will appear before kindhearted, caring people and shower them with happiness.

name: Togekiss
description: These Pokémon are never seen anywhere near conflict or turmoil. In recent times, they've hardly been seen at all.

attacks.name: Overdrive Smash
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon's  attack does +60 damage.

name: Misdreavus
description: This Pokémon startles people in the middle of the night. It gathers fear as its energy.

attacks.name: Magical Delusion
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Ralts
description: The horns on its head provide a strong power that enables it to sense people's emotions.

attacks.name: Teleport
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Kirlia
description: It has a psychic power that enables it to distort the space around it and see into the future.

name: Duskull
description: If it finds bad children who won't listen to their parents, it will spirit them away—or so it's said.

name: Dusclops
description: It seeks drifting will-o'-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.

name: Dusknoir
description: At the bidding of transmissions from the spirit world, it steals people and Pokémon away. No one knows whether it has a will of its own.

abilities.name: Shadow Void
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn, you may choose 1 of your Pokémon that has damage on it, and move all of its damage to this Pokémon.

name: Drifloon
description: It is whispered that any child who mistakes Drifloon for a balloon and holds on to it could wind up missing.

attacks.name: Expand
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

name: Drifblim
description: Some say this Pokémon is a collection of souls burdened with regrets, silently drifting through the dusk.

name: Uxie
description: Known as "The Being of Knowledge." It is said that it can wipe out the memory of those who see its eyes.

attacks.name: Mind Boost
attacks.effect: Take a Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to Mesprit or Azelf.

name: Mesprit
description: Known as "The Being of Emotion." It taught humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.

attacks.name: Supreme Blast
attacks.effect: You can use this attack only if you have Uxie and Azelf on your Bench. Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Azelf
description: Known as "The Being of Willpower." It sleeps at the bottom of a lake to keep the world in balance.

attacks.name: Psychic Arrow
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Giratina
description: This Pokémon is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours, where common knowledge is distorted and strange.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon has any Energy attached, it has no Retreat Cost.

name: Cresselia
description: Shiny particles are released from its wings like a veil. It is said to represent the crescent moon.

attacks.name: Moonlight Gain
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Rhyhorn
description: Strong, but not too bright, this Pokémon can shatter even a skyscraper with its charging tackles.

name: Rhydon
description: It begins walking on its hind legs after evolution. It can punch holes through boulders with its horn.

name: Rhyperior
description: It can load up to three projectiles per arm into the holes in its hands. What launches out of those holes could be either rocks or Roggenrola.

attacks.name: Mountain Swing
attacks.effect: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.

name: Gligar
description: It usually clings to cliffs. When it spots its prey, it spreads its wings and glides down to attack.

name: Gliscor
description: It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!

attacks.name: Acrobatics
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Hitmontop
description: It launches kicks while spinning. If it spins at high speed, it may bore its way into the ground.

name: Nosepass
description: It moves less than an inch a year, but when it's in a jam, it will spin and drill down into the ground in a split second.

name: Regirock
description: Every bit of Regirock's body is made of stone. As parts of its body erode, this Pokémon sticks rocks to itself to repair what's been lost.

abilities.name: Exoskeleton
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

name: Cranidos
description: A primeval Pokémon, it possesses a hard and sturdy skull, lacking any intelligence within.

name: Rampardos
description: In ancient times, people would dig up fossils of this Pokémon and use its skull, which is harder than steel, to make helmets.

attacks.name: Head Smash
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from this attack, this Pokémon also does 50 damage to itself.

name: Wormadam
description: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.

name: Riolu
description: They communicate with one another using their auras. They are able to run all through the night.

name: Lucario
description: It's said that no foe can remain invisible to Lucario, since it can detect auras—even those of foes it could not otherwise see.

abilities.name: Fighting Coach
abilities.effect: Attacks used by your Pokémon do +20 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Hippopotas
description: It shuts its nostrils tight, then travels through sand as if walking. They form colonies of around 10.

name: Hippowdon
description: It is surprisingly quick to anger. It holds its mouth agape as a display of its strength.

attacks.name: Energized Blade
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Murkrow
description: Feared and loathed by many, it is believed to bring misfortune to all those who see it at night.

name: Honchkrow
description: It is merciless by nature. It is said that it never forgives the mistakes of its Murkrow followers.

attacks.name: Skill Dive
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Sneasel
description: This cunning Pokémon hides under the cover of darkness, waiting to attack its prey.

attacks.name: Double Scratch
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Scratching Nails
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has damage on it, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Poochyena
description: A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.

name: Mightyena
description: It will always obey the commands of a skilled Trainer. Its behavior arises from its living in packs in ancient times.

name: Stunky
description: It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. Its stench spreads over a mile radius, driving Pokémon away.

name: Skuntank
description: It attacks by spraying a horribly smelly fluid from the tip of its tail. Attacks from above confound it.

attacks.name: Poison Gas
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Spiritomb
description: Its constant mischief and misdeeds resulted in it being bound to an Odd Keystone by a mysterious spell.

attacks.name: Swirling Disaster
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Skorupi
description: After burrowing into the sand, it waits patiently for prey to come near. This Pokémon and Sizzlipede share common descent.

name: Drapion
description: Its poison is potent, but it rarely sees use. This Pokémon prefers to use physical force instead, going on rampages with its car-crushing strength.

attacks.name: Cross Poison
attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 40 damage for each heads. If at least 2 of them are heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Croagunk
description: Inflating its poison sacs, it fills the area with an odd sound and hits flinching opponents with a poison jab.

attacks.name: Group Beatdown
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each Pokémon you have in play. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

name: Toxicroak
description: Swaying and dodging the attacks of its foes, it weaves its flexible body in close, then lunges out with its poisonous claws.

attacks.name: Group Beatdown
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each Pokémon you have in play. This attack does 40 damage for each heads.

name: Darkrai
description: It chases people and Pokémon from its territory by causing them to experience deep, nightmarish slumbers.

attacks.name: Dark Void
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

abilities.name: Nightmare Aura
abilities.effect: Whenever you attach a Energy from your Energy Zone to this Pokémon, do 20 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Skarmory
description: People fashion swords from Skarmory's shed feathers, so this Pokémon is a popular element in heraldic designs.

attacks.name: Metal Arms
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Registeel
description: Registeel's body is made of a strange material that is flexible enough to stretch and shrink but also more durable than any metal.

name: Shieldon
description: A mild-mannered, herbivorous Pokémon, it used its face to dig up tree roots to eat. The skin on its face was plenty tough.

name: Bastiodon
description: The bones of its face are huge and hard, so they were mistaken for its spine until after this Pokémon was successfully restored.

abilities.name: Guarded Grill
abilities.effect: If any damage is done to this Pokémon by attacks, flip a coin. If heads, this Pokémon takes −100 damage from that attack.

name: Wormadam
description: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.

attacks.name: Iron Head
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

name: Bronzor
description: Ancient people believed that the pattern on Bronzor's back contained a mysterious power.

name: Bronzong
description: In ages past, this Pokémon was revered as a bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.

attacks.name: Guard Press
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

name: Probopass
description: Although it can control its units known as Mini-Noses, they sometimes get lost and don't come back.

attacks.name: Triple Nose
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 50 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Metallic Turbo
attacks.effect: Take 2 Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Heatran
description: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

attacks.name: Steel Tackle
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

name: Gible
description: It skulks in caves, and when prey or an enemy passes by, it leaps out and chomps them. The force of its attack sometimes chips its teeth.

name: Gabite
description: In rare cases, it molts and sheds its scales. Medicine containing its scales as an ingredient will make a weary body feel invigorated.

name: Garchomp
description: It is said that when one runs at high speed, its wings create blades of wind that can fell nearby trees.

abilities.name: Reckless Shearing
abilities.effect: You must discard a card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may draw a card.

name: Lickitung
description: If this Pokémon's sticky saliva gets on you and you don't clean it off, an intense itch will set in. The itch won't go away, either.

attacks.name: Licking Fury
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 40 more damage for each heads.

name: Eevee
description: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Porygon
description: State-of-the-art technology was used to create Porygon. It was the first artificial Pokémon to be created via computer programming.

name: Porygon2
description: This is a Porygon that was updated with special data. Porygon2 develops itself by learning about many different subjects all on its own.

name: Porygon-Z
description: Porygon-Z had a program installed to allow it to move between dimensions, but the program also caused instability in Porygon-Z's behavior.

attacks.name: Buggy Beam
attacks.effect: Change the type of the next Energy that will be generated for your opponent to 1 of the following at random: , , , , , , , or .

name: Aipom
description: As it did more and more with its tail, its hands became clumsy. It makes its nest high in the treetops.

name: Ambipom
description: It uses its tails for everything. If it wraps both of its tails around you and gives you a squeeze, that's proof it really likes you.

attacks.name: Double Hit
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage for each heads.

name: Starly
description: They flock around mountains and fields, chasing after bug Pokémon. Their singing is noisy and annoying.

attacks.name: Pluck
attacks.effect: Before doing damage, discard all Pokémon Tools from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Staravia
description: Recognizing their own weakness, they always live in a group. When alone, a Staravia cries noisily.

name: Staraptor
description: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.

attacks.name: Clutch
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

name: Bidoof
description: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.

attacks.name: Super Fang
attacks.effect: Halve your opponent's Active Pokémon's remaining HP, rounded down.

name: Bibarel
description: It busily makes its nest with stacks of branches and roots it has cut up with its sharp incisors.

name: Buneary
description: If both of Buneary's ears are rolled up, something is wrong with its body or mind. It's a sure sign the Pokémon is in need of care.

name: Lopunny
description: Lopunny is constantly monitoring its surroundings. If danger approaches, this Pokémon responds with superdestructive kicks.

attacks.name: Jump Kick
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Glameow
description: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.

attacks.name: Pose
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Purugly
description: It would claim another Pokémon's nest as its own if it finds a nest sufficiently comfortable.

attacks.name: Interrupt
attacks.effect: Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose a card you find there and shuffle it into your opponent's deck.

name: Chatot
description: It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to trick them into thinking it's one of them. This way they won't attack it.

attacks.name: Fury Attack
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

name: Fan Rotom
description: This Rotom has entered an electric fan. It smirks with satisfaction over a prank well pulled after it blows away everything around it.

attacks.name: Spin Storm
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, put your opponent's Active Pokémon into their hand.

name: Regigigas
description: It is said to have made Pokémon that look like itself from a special ice mountain, rocks, and magma.

attacks.name: Raging Hammer
attacks.effect: This attack does more damage equal to the damage this Pokémon has on it.

name: Skull Fossil
effect: Play this card as if it were a 40-HP Basic Pokémon. At any time during your turn, you may discard this card from play. This card can't retreat.

name: Armor Fossil
effect: Play this card as if it were a 40-HP Basic Pokémon. At any time during your turn, you may discard this card from play. This card can't retreat.

name: Pokémon Communication
effect: Choose a Pokémon in your hand and switch it with a random Pokémon in your deck.

name: Giant Cape
effect: The Pokémon this card is attached to gets +20 HP.

name: Rocky Helmet
effect: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 20 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Lum Berry
effect: At the end of each turn, if the Pokémon this card is attached to is affected by any Special Conditions, it recovers from all of them, and discard this card.

name: Cyrus
effect: Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has damage on it to the Active Spot.

name: Team Galactic Grunt
effect: Put 1 random Glameow, Stunky, or Croagunk from your deck into your hand.

name: Cynthia
effect: During this turn, attacks used by your Garchomp or Togekiss do +50 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Volkner
effect: Choose 1 of your Electivire or Luxray. Attach 2 Energy from your discard pile to that Pokémon.

name: Dawn
effect: Move an Energy from 1 of your Benched Pokémon to your Active Pokémon.

name: Mars
effect: Your opponent shuffles their hand into their deck and draws a card for each of their remaining points needed to win.

name: Tangrowth
description: Tangrowth has two arms that it can extend as it pleases. Recent research has shown that these arms are, in fact, bundles of vines.

attacks.name: Mega Drain
attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Combee
description: At night, Combee sleep in a group of about a hundred, packed closely together in a lump.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.effect: Put 1 random  from your deck onto your Bench.

name: Carnivine
description: It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.

attacks.name: Flog
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Shaymin
description: It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.

abilities.name: Fragrant Flower Garden
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may heal 10 damage from each of your Pokémon.

name: Mamoswine
description: This Pokémon can be spotted in wall paintings from as far back as 10,000 years ago. For a while, it was thought to have gone extinct.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks from or Pokémon.

name: Gastrodon
description: They normally inhabit rocky seashores, but in times of continuous rain, they can sometimes be found in the mountains, far from the sea.

attacks.name: Muddy Water
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Manaphy
description: It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond with any kind of Pokémon.

attacks.name: Oceanic Gift
attacks.effect: Choose 2 of your Benched Pokémon. For each of those Pokémon, take a Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to that Pokémon.

name: Shinx
description: The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.

attacks.name: Hide
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

name: Rotom
description: Its electricity-like body can enter some kinds of machines and take control in order to make mischief.

attacks.name: Assault Laser
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Drifloon
description: It is whispered that any child who mistakes Drifloon for a balloon and holds on to it could wind up missing.

attacks.name: Expand
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

name: Mesprit
description: Known as "The Being of Emotion." It taught humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.

attacks.name: Supreme Blast
attacks.effect: You can use this attack only if you have Uxie and Azelf on your Bench. Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Giratina
description: This Pokémon is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours, where common knowledge is distorted and strange.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon has any Energy attached, it has no Retreat Cost.

name: Cresselia
description: Shiny particles are released from its wings like a veil. It is said to represent the crescent moon.

attacks.name: Moonlight Gain
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Rhyperior
description: It can load up to three projectiles per arm into the holes in its hands. What launches out of those holes could be either rocks or Roggenrola.

attacks.name: Mountain Swing
attacks.effect: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.

name: Lucario
description: It's said that no foe can remain invisible to Lucario, since it can detect auras—even those of foes it could not otherwise see.

abilities.name: Fighting Coach
abilities.effect: Attacks used by your Pokémon do +20 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Hippopotas
description: It shuts its nostrils tight, then travels through sand as if walking. They form colonies of around 10.

name: Spiritomb
description: Its constant mischief and misdeeds resulted in it being bound to an Odd Keystone by a mysterious spell.

attacks.name: Swirling Disaster
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Croagunk
description: Inflating its poison sacs, it fills the area with an odd sound and hits flinching opponents with a poison jab.

attacks.name: Group Beatdown
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each Pokémon you have in play. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

name: Heatran
description: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

attacks.name: Steel Tackle
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

name: Garchomp
description: It is said that when one runs at high speed, its wings create blades of wind that can fell nearby trees.

abilities.name: Reckless Shearing
abilities.effect: You must discard a card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may draw a card.

name: Staraptor
description: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.

attacks.name: Clutch
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

name: Bidoof
description: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.

attacks.name: Super Fang
attacks.effect: Halve your opponent's Active Pokémon's remaining HP, rounded down.

name: Glameow
description: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.

attacks.name: Pose
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Regigigas
description: It is said to have made Pokémon that look like itself from a special ice mountain, rocks, and magma.

attacks.name: Raging Hammer
attacks.effect: This attack does more damage equal to the damage this Pokémon has on it.

attacks.name: Air Slash
attacks.effect: Discard a random Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flare Blitz
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dimensional Storm
attacks.effect: Discard 3 Energy from this Pokémon. This attack also does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sparking Gadget
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Magical Delusion
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Energized Blade
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Scratching Nails
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has damage on it, this attack does 40 more damage.

abilities.name: Nightmare Aura
abilities.effect: Whenever you attach a Energy from your Energy Zone to this Pokémon, do 20 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Metallic Turbo
attacks.effect: Take 2 Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Licking Fury
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 40 more damage for each heads.

name: Cyrus
effect: Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has damage on it to the Active Spot.

name: Team Galactic Grunt
effect: Put 1 random Glameow, Stunky, or Croagunk from your deck into your hand.

name: Cynthia
effect: During this turn, attacks used by your Garchomp or Togekiss do +50 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Volkner
effect: Choose 1 of your Electivire or Luxray. Attach 2 Energy from your discard pile to that Pokémon.

name: Dawn
effect: Move an Energy from 1 of your Benched Pokémon to your Active Pokémon.

name: Mars
effect: Your opponent shuffles their hand into their deck and draws a card for each of their remaining points needed to win.

attacks.effect: Discard a random Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.effect: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
